summary: Replaces the female ragged trousers so they match the male version, as in just a pair of pants, no shirt.
descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

13/7/2016 - You may have noticed that I kinda stopped working on this. I will not update nor support this any further. I consider the main file containing the vanilla body version to be a finished product, and the others to be decent efforts, but I found rigging them to physics bodies or to the bodyslide system to be tedious. The altered game start option works, but is EXTREMELY likely to conflict with any other mod that affects any part of the game's opening (that sequence is held together by chewing gum as it is). If you want the trousers adapted to another body, or included in another mod, I invite you to do so, it's free for all.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It's my first mod, so naturally it's pants.

I was always a bit incensed that the so called "Ragged Trousers" were identical to the roughspun tunic for females, and though I've seen replacers before, they were never quite what I was expecting.

The female ragged trousers now are a pair of pants just like the male version.

Additionally, I've created an optional minor tweak so the Player starts a new game wearing the Ragged Trousers instead of the Roughspun Tunic. It lets you see your character a bit better during character creation, and shows off the new pants right from the start of the game!

Manual installation is as simple as dropping the contents of the .zip into your Skyrim folder.
All optional files require the main file to work


Thanks to:
Caliente for creating the phenomenal Bodyslide 2 and Outfit Studio, as well as the CBBE body.
Kiramin for solving the male to female mesh conversion.
Bethesda for The Elder Scrolls series and the Creation Kit.
author: oolbl549
